name: Cube Runner (itch) (James Medway, Hasan Tunc, Gökhan Karagöz, Kurts Kiwi Friend, PneumaVoid, carnivalfair, Sindre Skaraas)
name_original: Cube Runner (itch) (James Medway, Hasan Tunc, Gökhan Karagöz, Kurts Kiwi Friend, PneumaVoid, carnivalfair, Sindre Skaraas)
description:
CUBE RUNNER Welcome to Cube Runner, a time-attack racer where you strive to beat your best time! Take control of a cute cat and race on tracks across a cube to set a new personal record!  Upload your best times and share with your friends to see who is the fastest Cube Runner! Complete 3 laps to stop the timer. Try to beat your best time! How fast can you go? Controls Use WASD to control your racer. Listen to the soundtrack on soundcloud!

Submission to the Black & White Game Jam #8

Credits:

Developers: Gökhan Karagöz | https://github.com/gkaragoz & Hasan Tunç | https://github.com/tunchasan

3D Art: Thomas Sayle | https://itch.io/profile/kurts-kiwi-friend

2D Art: Sindre | https://sindre-skaraas.itch.io/

Music: Pneuma | https://pneumavoid.itch.io/

UX/UI: Nikkai | https://carnivalfair.itch.io/

Producer: James Medway | https://imafirehazard.itch.io/
